nodes.bodyText: How come we're not using SchemaRegistryUtil#getLatestSchema() here?
umm, I wasn't aware that existed!
also 🤦 seems like I created it...

Are we handling the case where no schema is present in Schema Registry? I know this doesn't happen under normal circumstances since ksqlDB registers schemas at source creation time, but we should handle potential subsequent deletion by the user gracefully rather than throwing an NPE.
I thought it throws an exception if the schema does not exist with a 404 but I will double check that (so it would be handled in the catch block below)
It appears that your comment above handles this case 😂
